features.name: Pomodoro timer
features.description: Countdown timer with play/pause and reset; session completion advances plant stage.

features.name: Plant growth stages
features.description: Visual plant stages (start/middle/end) shown as images; plant resets to start image when dead.

features.name: Plant died popup
features.description: Modal popup 'Your plant died!' when user pauses or resets mid-session; plant resets to start image.

features.name: To-do list
features.description: Left-side panel to add, list, and remove to-do items with Enter key and trash button; preserved on restart.

features.name: Sessions completed and harvest
features.description: Displays sessions completed count and progress dots; after 3 sessions prompts 'Start over with a new seed' and resets everything except to-do list.

features.name: App entry and styles
features.description: React root, global CSS, and Tailwind setup.
